author: mamta
msg: CharConstantNode (and every QueryTreeNode) has a getLanguageConnection() method that provides access to the current language connection. That call should get used in bindExpression rather than ConnectionUtil to get current language connection.

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1345.  Fix HDFS to correctly retry another replica when a checksum error is encountered.  Contributed by Hairong.

author: imario
msg: VFS-147: Use monitorThread instead of Thread.currentThread - Thanks to Adam Heath for the patch!

author: chirino
msg: Updaed the mail component so that mail headers are correctly copied over from message to message.  This highlighted the fact
that th TO: should always be what is specified on the outbound endpoint instead of the To: in the message.
Added a test the validates headers are preserved.

author: imario
msg: VFS-145 + VFS-157: Use HashMap for caches and cache calculated hashCode in FileName - Thanks to Adam Heath for the patch!
